BasicSARSCR.ParameterDescriptions: The Acceleration Factor (AF), which is also referred to as the Step, dictates SAR sensitivity.Step gradually increases as the trend extends until it hits a maximum. SAR sensitivity can be decreased by decreasing the Step. A lower step moves SAR further from price, which makes a reversal less likely.

BasicSARSCR.Description: Screen stock with SAR signal for buy

BasicDMI_CutLoss.Description: Buy when there is cut between DI+ and DI-. Sell when DI- crosses DI+. Cut loss when the strategy bypass the Stop Loss Level
